Privacy Policy At [Age Calculate], we value your privacy. This app does not collect, store, or share any personal information. All calculations are performed locally on your device. Data Security: Your data never leaves your device. We do not require internet permissions and there are no hidden data collection processes. All date information you input is immediately discarded after calculations. App Functionality: Calculate your age in years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, and seconds from your birth date to the current date. Determine your zodiac sign based on your birth date using standard astrological calculations. All results are generated in real-time and never stored. Zodiac Calculation: Zodiac signs are determined using tropical astrology dates:

‚Ä¢ Aries: March 21 - April 19
‚Ä¢ Taurus: April 20 - May 20
‚Ä¢ Gemini: May 21 - June 20
‚Ä¢ Cancer: June 21 - July 22
‚Ä¢ Leo: July 23 - August 22
‚Ä¢ Virgo: August 23 - September 22
‚Ä¢ Libra: September 23 - October 22
‚Ä¢ Scorpio: October 23 - November 21
‚Ä¢ Sagittarius: November 22 - December 21
‚Ä¢ Capricorn: December 22 - January 19
‚Ä¢ Aquarius: January 20 - February 18
‚Ä¢ Pisces: February 19 - March 20 Calculation Method: Age calculations consider:
‚Ä¢ Gregorian calendar dates
‚Ä¢ Leap years
‚Ä¢ Month length variations
‚Ä¢ Time zones based on device settings
‚Ä¢ Daylight saving time adjustments
All results are approximate and based on 24-hour days. Important Notes: ‚Ä¢ For entertainment purposes only
‚Ä¢ Not medical/legal advice
‚Ä¢ Zodiac interpretations may vary
‚Ä¢ Calendar conversions may have historical inaccuracies
‚Ä¢ Does not account for relativistic effects
About Us About Our Age Calculator App Welcome to [Age Calculator], your go-to app for calculating age accurately and effortlessly. Our app helps you determine your age in years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, and seconds from your birth date to the current date. Additionally, it provides your zodiac sign based on your birth date. Key Features: 1. Accurate Age Calculation: Calculate your age in years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
2. Zodiac Sign: Discover your zodiac sign based on your birth date.
3. User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design for easy navigation.
4. Privacy-Focused: No personal data is collected or shared. App Settings: 1. Theme: Choose between light and dark themes for a personalized experience.
2. Notifications: Enable or disable reminders for special occasions.
3. Language: Select your preferred language for the app interface.
4. Data Usage: Control how the app uses your data for calculations. Contact Us: If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to reach out to us at info@softsow.com We value your input and are always here to help!
